RPyC¶

This module forms part of the rpyc vistrails capabilties. It adds multicore parallel and distributed processing to VisTrails.

RPyC¶

RPyCHelper¶

RPyCTest¶

Shared¶

This module is a globals dummy module.

The variable isRemoteRPyCNode is set in this module to allow remote and local nodes to become aware of whether they are the master node or not
